item.title: Constitutional amendment to allow Trump third term introduced in the House
item.description: President Donald Trump has hinted at the possibility of somehow serving a third term in office.

item.title: Costco shareholders reject call for review of diversity programs
item.description: Costco Wholesale shareholders voted strongly against a proposal requesting a report on the risks of maintaining its diversity and inclusion initiative...

item.title: Trump executive order declassifies JFK, RFK, Martin Luther King Jr. assassination files
item.description: Official conclusions say lone gunmen committed the assassinations of President John Kennedy, Sen. Robert Kennedy and the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Supreme Court allows anti-money laundering law to take effect
item.description: The federal law requires corporate entities to disclose the identities of their real beneficial owners to the Treasury Department.

item.title: Sen. Lisa Murkowski to vote against Hegseth, first Republican to oppose a Trump Cabinet pick
item.description: Several GOP senators, including Murkowski and Sen. Susan Collins of Maine, are being widely watched for their votes on Trump's pick for Defense Secret...
